ya10.3.4:1.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ pajahitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:2.1_0: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ pajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:4.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:5.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:7.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:8.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No.
ya10.3.4:9.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:10.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ parijānātīti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:11.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:12.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:14.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:15.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No.
ya10.3.4:16.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ pajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:17.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ pajahatīti? No.
ya10.3.4:18.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ bhāvitthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:19.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No.
ya10.3.4:20.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:21.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No.
ya10.3.4:22.1_0: Yo aññindriyaṁ bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikaritthāti? No.
ya10.3.4:23.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ bhāvetīti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṁ.)
ya10.3.4:24.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.4:25.1_2: Cha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.4:26.1_0: Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṁ nappajahittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:27.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:28.1_2: Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:29.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:30.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:31.1_2: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:32.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:33.1_2: Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:34.1_0: Yo cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānāti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:35.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:36.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so cakkhundriyaṁ na parijānātīti?
ya10.3.4:37.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha cakkhundriyañca na parijānanti.
ya10.3.4:38.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:39.1_2: Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:40.1_0: Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti? Āmantā.
ya10.3.4:41.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:42.1_2: Satta puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:43.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:44.1_2: Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
ya10.3.4:45.1_0: Yo domanassindriyaṁ nappajahati so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:46.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahanti aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:47.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so domanassindriyaṁ nappajahatīti?
ya10.3.4:48.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha domanassindriyañca nappajahanti.
ya10.3.4:49.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.4:50.1_2: Satta puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.4:51.1_0: Yo vā pana aññindriyaṁ na bhāvittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:52.1_2: Satta puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.
ya10.3.4:53.1_0: Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:54.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:55.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:56.1_2: Aṭṭha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāventi.
ya10.3.4:57.1_0: Yo aññindriyaṁ na bhāveti so aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikaritthāti?
ya10.3.4:58.1_2: Cha puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāventi aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha.
ya10.3.4:59.1_0: Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṁ na sacchikarittha so aññindriyaṁ na bhāvetīti?
ya10.3.4:60.1_2: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarittha aññindriyañca na bhāventi.
